snippet: Many consumers are not sure what a Web browser is. But these programs have become a crucial business for tech companies like Google and Microsoft, Claire Cain Miller reports in Monday's New York Times. That is because they are now the entry point not...
abstract: Many consumers are not sure what a Web browser is. But these programs have become a crucial business for tech companies like Google and Microsoft, Claire Cain Miller reports in Monday's New York Times. That is because they are now the entry point not just to the Web but to everything stored online.

headline.main: Daily Report: The Browser Wars Are Back
